title: Highway Patrol / Motor Patrol 1950 (Thriller, Crime) directed by Sam Newfield |Colorized Movie

sources.title: Highway Patrol / Motor Patrol 1950 (Thriller, Crime) directed by Sam Newfield |Colorized Movie
sources.description:
The Signals Changed to CRIME When a Terror Gang Hit the Road...
A cop poses as a member of a stolen-car ring to capture the men responsible for the murder of his fiancee’s brother.

Original title: Motor Patrol (1950) AKA: Highway Patrol

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/3Du_Mk5-SKw


Director: Sam Newfield
Writers: Maurice Tombragel, Orville H. Hampton
Stars: Don Castle, Jane Nigh, Reed Hadley
Genres: Comedy, Crime, Drama, Thriller

This film is subtitled in many languages.  Click ⚙️ for more options

00:00 Full Movie
05:51 Highway Patrol officers investigate a hit and run incident involving a young man. The incident leads to questions and concerns among the people involved.
09:04 Fatal incident investigation reveals surprising details about the victim's life and associates.
14:19 Undercover investigation of a crime scene involving a hit-and-run, arguments, and a suspicious death at a cafe.
19:19 A series of events unfold as a man tries to get a refund from a phone operator, leading to a conversation about a mysterious death and a stolen car.
25:38 Police investigation into a stolen car leads to a homicide case involving a young hood from Chicago. Larry's death is linked to Thompson's, and Ken Foster offers to help solve the case.
34:17 Undercover detective investigates a car theft operation linked to a garage owner and a criminal organization.
41:57 Crime investigation reveals car theft and murder connections in a thrilling plot.
47:26 Undercover operation uncovers stolen car racket and potential suspect in hit-and-run case.
55:44 Undercover operation reveals car theft and hit-and-run scheme, leading to arrests and a new career opportunity.
